claim: People who died during the construction of Hoover Dam had their bodies removed no bodies are buried in it.

supporting.text: Historical records confirm that all fatalities during Hoover Dam's construction were accounted for and their bodies were removed from the site.

attacks.text: Historical records confirm that all fatalities during Hoover Dam's construction were accounted for and their bodies were removed from the site.

The Hoover Dam project was highly regulated with strict safety and record-keeping protocols, reducing the likelihood of unrecorded fatalities.
